snippet.title: EVE Online | The Fabric of EVE - 20th Anniversary Mosaic
snippet.description:
On 6 May 2003, the age of the capsuleer began.  

In the twenty years since, the friendships, rivalries, achievements, and stories of countless immortal pilots have interwoven to form the fabric of New Eden – breathing life into the void of space and growing the world of EVE into something far greater than the sum of its innumerable parts. 

Created as part of the 20th anniversary celebrations for EVE Online, the Fabric of EVE Mosaic harmonizes individual character portraits, weaving the community of the world’s largest living work of science-fiction into a grand tapestry symbolizing the history of the magnificent space opera the capsuleers of New Eden have written.  

Find out more about the 20th anniversary celebrations for EVE Online. 
https://www.eveonline.com/news/view/celebrate-eves-20th-anniversary

The Third Decade has begun, and your future as a capsuleer awaits. Play EVE for free at http://EVE.Online/Fly_Now 

#EVEOnline #spacegames #mmo
